mapper.insert: insert into MOBILE_NEWS (ID,CASEID,TITLE, CONTENT, STATE, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_DATETIME, TYPE,USERID, USERORGID,MESSAGETYPE) values (#{id},#{caseId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{state}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateDatetime}, #{type},#{userid} ,#{userOrg},#{messageType})
mapper.update: update MOBILE_NEWS set TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, STATE = #{state}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}, TYPE = #{type}, USERID = #{userid}, CASEID = #{caseId}, USERORGID=#{userOrg}, MESSAGETYPE = #{messageType} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STATE, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_DATETIME, TYPE,USERID,CASEID,USERORGID,MESSAGETYPE from MOBILE_NEWS where ID = #{id}
select ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STATE, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_DATETIME, TYPE,USERID,CASEID,USERORGID,MESSAGETYPE from MOBILE_NEWS
SELECT count(CASE WHEN m.STATE IN('0')THEN 'un' END) AS NotReading, count(CASE WHEN m.STATE IN('1')THEN 'an' END) AS Reading FROM MOBILE_NEWS m where m.userid = #{0}
select t.* from MOBILE_NEWS t where 1 = 1 AND t.USERID = #{userid} AND t.TYPE = #{type} AND t.STATE = 0 order by t.CREATE_DATETIME desc
SELECT s.* FROM MOBILE_NEWS s WHERE 1=1 AND s.USERID='pc' AND s.MESSAGETYPE = 2 AND s.USERORGID = #{userOrg}
